coreAttributes.name: SWORD dagger
coreAttributes.description: A double-edged fighting knife with a foil grip, issued to SWORD Enforcers. Its tapered, sharply pointed blade is made for thrusting and stabbing attacks. This particular dagger is a rare first pattern example, issued from 1976-1977.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] dagger at [npc.her] hip and releases the snap fastener on the retaining strap so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] dagger at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade pierces [npc2.her] body!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dagger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight into [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dagger, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade stabs right into [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dagger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(thrust)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dagger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
